BodyName: Committee on Civil Service and Labor

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to health insurance coverage for the surviving spouse or domestic partner and children of deceased city employees whose death is the natural and proximate result of an accident or injury sustained while in the performance of duty.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Health insurance coverage for the surviving spouse or domestic partner and children of deceased city employees.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to extending annual leave to city employees who return from combat military service.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Extending annual leave to city employees who return from combat military service.
